greeting.text: Oh! I didn't expect... I mean, hello. I'm Elena. I used to work as a scribe before... before the fire. Are you perhaps in need of writing services? I still have my skills, even if I've lost my shop.

choices.text: I'm sorry to hear about the fire. What happened?
I might need a letter written. What are your rates?
Is there anything I can do to help?

fire_story.text: Three months ago, Master Aldric's shop burned down. They say it was an accident, but... I lost everything. My position, my lodgings, even most of my belongings. Now I write letters here in the square for whatever people can pay.

choices.text: That must have been devastating. I'm truly sorry.
You don't think it was an accident?

discuss_rates.text: I charge 2 coins for a simple letter, 5 for anything requiring official formatting. I know it's not the cheapest, but I guarantee perfect penmanship and proper form. Your words will be given the respect they deserve.

choices.text: I'd like you to write a letter for me.
I'll keep that in mind for later.

grateful_for_offer.text: You're very kind to ask. Actually... if you hear of anyone needing a skilled scribe, permanent position or temporary work, I'd be grateful if you'd mention my name. I'm trying to save enough to start again.

choices.text: I'll keep an ear out for opportunities.

appreciate_sympathy.text: Thank you. It's been hard, but I'm managing. Every letter I write is a step toward rebuilding. Your kindness means more than you know.

hint_at_mystery.text: I... I shouldn't say. But Master Aldric had been writing letters for some very important people. The night before the fire, he seemed worried. He told me to go home early. I never saw him again.

choices.text: Perhaps it's better not to dwell on it.
If you ever want someone to look into it...

write_letter.text: Excellent! Who shall I address it to, and what would you like to say? I'll make sure every word is perfect.

always_here.text: Of course. I'm here most days, rain or shine. A scribe must be reliable, after all.

thankful.text: Oh, thank you! That would be wonderful. I promise, anyone who hires me won't regret it. I may have lost my shop, but not my skills or my dedication.

agree_drop_it.text: You're probably right. The past is past. I need to focus on the future.

careful_consideration.text: I... I'll think about it. It's dangerous to dig into such matters. But if I ever need someone trustworthy, I'll remember your offer. Thank you.
